name: F.passage
description: Estimates passage between two dates by day, week, month, or year.

name: F.weekly.passage
description: Estimates production for every week between two dates

name: F.lifestage.passage
friendly: Estimates production by life stage and run
description: Estimates production of all lifestages in all runs between two dates

name: F.release.summary
description: Summarizes release and recapture information in tabular form.

name: F.take.table
description: Produces a table of daily live and dead catch by taxon-run-lifestage.

name: F.length.frequency
description: Graphs length frequency distribution, optionally by life stage.

name: F.size.by.date
description: Graphs fork length (y-axis) as a function of date (x-axis) by life stage.  Stages bigger than smolt excluded.

name: F.annual.passage
description: Estimates production every year between two dates.

name: F.weekly.effort
description: Produces a bar chart of the proportion of each week trap was fishing.
